channel.title: Route Planning on davidgao7 blog
channel.description: Recent content in Route Planning on davidgao7 blog

item.title: Evolution of Route Planning in Urban Env
item.description:
Great! I’ll do a deep dive into route planning methods with a chronological perspective—starting from classical algorithms like BFS/DFS and greedy search, moving through reinforcement learning methods, and finally the integration of large language models (LLMs). I’ll cover both theoretical math and real-world applications (especially in large cities like Shanghai), and compare Baidu’s industry contributions with global competitors, noting any gaps and causes.

I’ll also include citations for academic and industrial work, codebases (Python), and explain formulas with examples. This will all be presented at a level suited to your CS background and experience in ML, cloud, and systems.
